definition: to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: At work, at paying out a cable or winding up a capstan, Jean Valjean was worth four men.
sentences.chinese: 服劳役时，扭铁索，推绞盘，冉阿让抵得上四个人。

sentences.english: This peg must prevent the winch from unwinding .
sentences.chinese: 这木桩一定是用来防止绞盘松开的。

sentences.english: Thanks to Capstan, a restored version will now be released in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 到绞盘，恢复版本将在2012年发布的。

sentences.english: It's an amphibious vehicle, which has a winch and a water cannon.
sentences.chinese: 它是一种水路两栖载具，所以配备有绞盘和水炮。

sentences.english: The question of who would operate the winch, however, was still unresolved.
sentences.chinese: 但谁来操纵绞盘的问题还没有解决。

sentences.english: All planetary winches incorporate a spring applied-hydraulic brake.
sentences.chinese: 所有的行星绞盘都有一个弹簧应用液压制动器。

sentences.english: Capstan imagesetter works such as shown in Figure 2.
sentences.chinese: 绞盘式照排机的处事道理如图2所示。

sentences.english: Winch upgrade, load and a set of dual-reflector system link.
sentences.chinese: 有提升绞盘，负载反光镜和一套双挂钩系统。

sentences.english: The pull on the wire is exerted in this area, between the die box and the capstan .
sentences.chinese: 拉伸的导线外露在该区域中，在拉模盒和绞盘之间。

sentences.english: The fascia tension could increase by 66% due to windlass mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 绞盘机制的作用可以使筋膜的张力增加66%。

sentences.english: Winches are typically used to raise the mainsail and to trim in jib sheets.
sentences.chinese: 绞盘通常用来升起主帆，或嵌入前三角帆的帆脚索。

sentences.english: Workers were hauling a loaded train by a winch.
sentences.chinese: 工作人员正以绞盘牵引过磅的重车。

sentences.english: Due to the winch recycle design of the disinfecting tube , the operation is very simple.
sentences.chinese: 且消毒管采用绞盘式回收，作业便捷。

sentences.english: Remove the hose boudles from the yellow and blue hose reels .
sentences.chinese: 从黄兰绞盘上卸下跨接软管。

sentences.english: Is there any potential for us to receive an order for the winches?
sentences.chinese: 有没有在我们的任何潜力能接受一份订单为绞盘？

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
